bomberman.game.activeelements

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.game.elements.GameElement
      • bomberman.game.activeelements.ActiveElement
        • bomberman.game.activeelements.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends ActiveElement
    Class used to instantiate bombs whenever the player/gamer drops. Inherits from ActiveElement
    Author:
    thebomberman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb(Map map, GameMultiplayer gameMulti, int x, int y)
      This constructor is used for multiplayer games.
      Bomb(Map map, java.lang.String bombs)
      This constructor is used for loading games from database.
      Bomb(Player player, Map map)
      Constructor used for whenever a player/gamer drops a bomb.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void explode()
      Explodes the bomb, by setting the remove variable to true and removing it from the list of bombs present in the main game.
      int getRange() 
      long getTimeLeft() 
      void render(Screen screen)
      Method renders bomb to the screen.
      void update()
      Method used to update the bomb state by changing the variable that decides which sprite is going to be rendered.

        getCurrSprite, getCurrTime, getDirX, getDirY, getNewX, getNewY, isAlive, isDie, isMoving

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(Player player,
            Map map)
        Constructor used for whenever a player/gamer drops a bomb.
        Parameters:
        player - To get player coordinates and place the bomb.
        map - Bomb belongs only to this map.

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(Map map,
            java.lang.String bombs)
        This constructor is used for loading games from database. This loads a bomb that was saved in a game with important specific characteristics, like remaining time.
        Parameters:
        map - Bombs belongs only to this map.
        bombs - Formated String that contains the state of the bomb. The parameters are split by commas.

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(Map map,
            GameMultiplayer gameMulti,
            int x,
            int y)
        This constructor is used for multiplayer games. Instead of the bomb being instantiated in the player position. It is instantiated by the given coordinates,
        Parameters:
        map - Belongs only to this map.
        gameMulti - Belongs to this game only.
        x - X coordinate.
        y - Y coordinate.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Method used to update the bomb state by changing the variable that decides which sprite is going to be rendered.
        Specified by:
        update in class GameElement

      • render

        public void render(Screen screen)
        Method renders bomb to the screen. It renders for the previously defined duration time (in milliseconds) only if it's not an multiplayer game, which state is decided by given instructions.
        Specified by:
        render in class ActiveElement
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen the bomb is going to be renderes

      • getRange

        public int getRange()
        Returns:
        Bomb flame range

      • getTimeLeft

        public long getTimeLeft()
        Returns:
        Time since bomb has been dropped

      • explode

        public void explode()
        Explodes the bomb, by setting the remove variable to true and removing it from the list of bombs present in the main game.
